Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Classes

Class TerminalCharacters

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Classes.tui.TerminalCharacters
public class TerminalCharacters extends Object
This class contains all the supported Characters that can be printed in TUI, along with their String representations. Each Character has 2 forms: and Advanced and a Simple one. Advanced Mode uses emojis to represent objects, while Simple Mode uses standard Unicode Characters. Every Character String is 2 chars long. A boolean value defines which Mode is selected.

    • getCharacter

      public String getCharacter(Characters character)
      Getter Method for the Strings without option for color. Uses the default value to decide if the String has to be colored or not.
      Parameters:
      character - : a value from the Characters enum, indicating one of the supported Characters
      Returns:
      a String representation of that Character, based on the currently selected mode (Advanced/Enhanced/Standard).

    • getCharacter

      public String getCharacter(Characters character, boolean color)
      Getter Method for the Strings
      Parameters:
      character - : a value from the Characters enum, indicating one of the supported Characters
      color - : a boolean value that specifies if the method has to return a formatted input including color or not
      Returns:
      a String representation of that Character, based on the currently selected mode (Advanced/Enhanced/Standard).
